short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects to stuff you're supposed to be studying

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Study Redirect helps you stay productive by redirecting you to your study materials when visiting distracting sites like YouTube or Twitter. Customize trigger URLs and redirect links to match your needs.
